sentences.en: "Things are moving ahead."— I found that statement vague and unclear.
sentences.cn: “事情正在取得进展。”——我认为这个说法含糊不清。

sentences.en: According to the assessor's statement, the fire damage was not severe.
sentences.cn: 根据估价员的估计, 火灾损失并不严重.

sentences.en: By his own statement, there have been imperfections in his judgment.
sentences.cn: 据他自己声称，他的判断存在不足之处。

sentences.en: Excuse me, but I don't think that statement is quite true.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 不过我认为那话不十分真实.

sentences.en: Glass, exposed beams, and antiques all combine to make a strong decorative statement.
sentences.cn: 将玻璃、裸露的柱子和古董结合在一起制造出强烈的装饰效果

sentences.en: His statement isn't merely an idle boast.
sentences.cn: 他的话不仅仅是虚张声势的自夸。

sentences.en: I have made the above statement for your consideration.
sentences.cn: 我作了以上发言,请予考虑.

sentences.en: I wish to enlarge upon a statement made by Gary Docking.
sentences.cn: 我想就加里·多金的话再展开说一下。

sentences.en: In an official statement, she formally announced her resignation.
sentences.cn: 在一份官方声明中，她正式宣布辞职。

sentences.en: She was accused of knowingly making a false statement to the police.
sentences.cn: 她被指控故意向警方提供虚假供词。

sentences.en: Such a statement could lay her open to ridicule.
sentences.cn: 这种言论会让人家笑话她。

sentences.en: The company prepared a statement of its profits and losses.
sentences.cn: 该公司做了一份损益清单.

sentences.en: The following recipe is a statement of another kind—food is fun!
sentences.cn: 下面的食谱是另一种观点的表现——食物可以带来乐趣！

sentences.en: The statement salutes the changes of the past year.
sentences.cn: 这一表态称赞了过去一年的变革。

sentences.en: There had been something in Des'sfirst statement.
sentences.cn: 德斯最初的陈述有些道理。

sentences.en: This shirt is great for anyone who wants to make a fashion statement .
sentences.cn: 要求着装独树一帜的人穿这件衬衫最合适。

sentences.en: Your statement is in conflict with the rest of the evidence.
sentences.cn: 你的陈述同其余证据有矛盾.
